panels.title: Database Query Rate by Service and Operation

targets.expr: sum(rate(cache_hits_total{service=~"$service", environment="$environment"}[$interval])) by (service) / (sum(rate(cache_hits_total{service=~"$service", environment="$environment"}[$interval])) by (service) + sum(rate(cache_misses_total{service=~"$service", environment="$environment"}[$interval])) by (service)) * 100

title: Task Management System - Services Dashboard
description: Comprehensive monitoring of microservices in the Task Management System
